channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Softcult – “She Said, He Said”
item.description: Softcult sparks a gender-bending revolution with their new track "She Said, He Said"! 🎸🔥 #Softcult #NewMusicAlert

item.title: J-Hope Previews New Concert Film With ‘Killin’ It Girl’ Performance
item.description: 🔥 Dive into the world of J-Hope with a sneak peek of his electrifying ‘Killin’ It Girl’ performance! 🎶 #JHope #ConcertFilmAntics

item.title: See Demi Lovato Mashup Lady Gaga’s ‘Mayhem’ Songs for BBC Radio 1 Live Lounge
item.description: 🎶 Demi Lovato serving us a tasty Lady Gaga mashup on BBC Radio 1 Live Lounge! 🔥 Who's ready for this musical magic? ✨ #DemiLovato #LadyGaga #BBCRadio1

item.title: NFL Commissioner Backs Bad Bunny’s Super Bowl Show as Conservatives Keep Melting Down
item.description: 🏈🐰 Bad Bunny bringing the heat at the Super Bowl with NFL Commissioner's support! 🔥 Who else is ready for this epic halftime show? 🎶 #SuperBunnyBowling

item.title: Bon Jovi Announce 2026 ‘Forever’ Tour Marking Return to the Road After Jon’s Vocal-Cord Surgery
item.description: 🎸 Get ready to rock! Bon Jovi is hitting the road in 2026 for their 'Forever' Tour post Jon's vocal-cord surgery! 🎤 #BonJoviForeverTour
